page.title: 11RELIGION
page.content: RELIGION ________ There are many chapels in our area.There are five in our village alone,but three of those are empty. There are 2 Sunday scools,one in the chapel and the other in church. During the 1900's the chapels were full because of the religious revival,but now they stand empty.There is one Catholic church for the whole area and most of the english people go there.Chapel is open three times on Sunday.It is open 10.00a.m for the morning service,at 2.00p.m for Sunday school and at 6.00p.m for evening service.When we asked the children in our school if they enjoyed going to chapel most of them said it was boring.
